productTabs.fastShippingDesc: Receive your order in 3-5 business days.
productTabs.easyReturnsDesc: Product returns are available within 14 days.

store.allProductsDesc: Discover our complete collection of premium leather bags

footer.newsletterDesc: Be the first to know about new collections and special promotions.
footer.brandDesc: Premium leather bags, handcrafted with mastery. To complement your style.

pages.aboutBrandDesc: Bag World was founded for lovers of premium quality leather bags. Our mission is to offer each customer the highest quality, handmade bags that combine style and functionality.
pages.aboutVisionDesc: We believe that a bag is not just an accessory, but an expression of your individuality. That's why every bag we create is handcrafted by experienced artisans from natural, premium leather.
pages.aboutMaterialDesc: Natural leather selected from Italian and Georgian tanneries.
pages.aboutHandmadeDesc: Every bag is handcrafted by experienced artisans.
pages.aboutWarrantyDesc: All products come with a 2-year warranty.
pages.aboutFastDeliveryDesc: Delivery within 1-3 business days across Georgia.
pages.shippingTimeDesc: Delivery in Tbilisi takes 1-2 business days. Regional delivery takes 2-4 business days. International shipping takes 5-10 business days.
pages.shippingCostDesc: Free delivery in Tbilisi for orders over 200 GEL. For orders under 200 GEL, delivery costs 5 GEL. Regional delivery costs 10 GEL.
pages.shippingPackagingDesc: All products are shipped in premium packaging, including a branded box and dust bag. Gift wrapping is available for an additional 10 GEL.
pages.shippingTrackingDesc: After placing your order, you will receive an email with a tracking number to monitor your package in real time.
pages.returnsPeriodDesc: Products can be returned within 14 calendar days of receipt. The product must be in its original packaging, unused and undamaged.
pages.returnsProcessDesc: To initiate a return, contact us at info@chantebis.ge or call +995 555 123 456. Our team will assist you through every step of the return process.
pages.returnsRefundDesc: After receiving and inspecting the product, the refund will be issued to the same payment method within 5-7 business days.
pages.returnsExceptionsDesc: Personalized products and custom-made bags are not eligible for return, except in cases of manufacturing defects.
pages.returnsWarrantyDesc: All products come with a 2-year warranty against manufacturing defects. The warranty covers issues related to stitching, hardware, and leather quality.

meta.siteDesc: Handcrafted, premium leather bags. Special collections to complement your style.
meta.storeDesc: Discover our collection of premium leather bags.

home.featuredProductsDesc: Most popular, premium quality bag models.
home.premiumMaterialsDesc: Carefully selected natural leather from Italian and Georgian tanneries.
home.masterCraftsmanshipDesc: Every bag is handcrafted by experienced artisans.
home.qualityGuaranteeDesc: All products come with a 2-year warranty. Your satisfaction is our priority.
home.firstPurchaseDesc: Sign up and be the first to know about special promotions.
home.defaultProductDesc: Premium quality leather bag, handcrafted by artisans.
